flan.inspectNoClaim: This place belongs to no one.
flan.claimBlocksFormat: Claim Blocks attuned: %1$d + bonus %2$d; Spent: %3$d; Remaining power: %4$d
flan.onlyOnePlayer: Only a single soul may be named.
flan.ownerTransferSuccess: The bond has shifted. New keeper: %1$s.
flan.ownerTransferFail: Only the true keeper may pass this bond on.
flan.ownerTransferNoBlocks: The new keeper lacks the essence to bind this land.
flan.ownerTransferNoBlocksAdmin: You may ignore this cost while cloaked in admin might.
flan.noSuchLevel: No realm exists with the id %s.
flan.noSuchPlayer: No spirit answers to the uuid or name %s.
flan.claimCreationFailCommand: The ritual failed. A claim could not form here.
flan.noPermission: ยง7A mysterious force prevents you from doing this...
flan.noPermissionSimple: ยง7A mysterious force prevents you from doing this...
flan.noPermissionTooClose: A nearby warded place twists your attempt.
flan.tooCloseClaim: You stand too close to protected ground.
flan.cantClaimHere: Something older than you forbids a claim here.
flan.minClaimSize: The ward is too small. The minimum attunement size is %d.
flan.maxClaims: You have bound as many lands as fate allows.
flan.landClaimDisabledWorld: This realm resists all claim magic.
flan.notEnoughBlocks: Your claim power is too weak.
flan.conflictOther: These runes collide with other wards.
flan.wrongMode: Your focus is misaligned. You are in %1$s mode.
flan.conflictSpawn: The ward would disturb a sacred spawn refuge.
flan.claimCooldown: The earth still hums from your last ritual. Wait %s ticks.
flan.groupAdd: A new circle has been formed: %1$s.
flan.groupExist: That circle already exists in the ledger.
flan.uuidFakeAdd: A phantom with uuid %1$s has been bound to this claim.
flan.uuidFakeRemove: The phantom with uuid %1$s has been released from this claim.
flan.uuidFakeModifyNo: A phantom with this uuid is already entwined.
flan.playerModify: Shifted the circle for these souls to %1$s: %2$s.
flan.playerModifyNo: Their bonds could not be altered. Perhaps they already serve another circle.
flan.playerGroupAddFail: That soul cannot be added. Either it already walks another circle or no matching name was found.
flan.claimCreateSuccess: A new warded territory has awakened.
flan.subClaimCreateSuccess: A new sub-ward has taken form.
flan.deleteAllClaimConfirm: Do you truly wish to unmake all your claims? Speak the words again to prove your intent.
flan.deleteAllClaim: Every one of your claims has been released.
flan.deleteClaimError: The weave refuses to let you unmake this ward.
flan.deleteSubClaimError: No sub-ward answers here. Switch your focus if you wish to unmake the main ward.
flan.deleteSubClaimAll: All sub-wards tied to this claim have faded.
flan.editPerm: The binding %1$s now gleams with value %2$s.
flan.editPersonalGroup: Default binding %1$s for circle %2$s now resonates as %3$s.
flan.nonGlobalOnly: The binding %1$s is woven into the world and cannot be altered here.
flan.adminDeleteAll: All claims dissolved for these souls: %1$s.
flan.setAdminClaim: The aura of this claim now belongs to overseer: %1$s.
flan.readGriefpreventionClaimDataSuccess: The old claim runes have been read successfully.
flan.readGriefpreventionPlayerDataSucces: The old player records have been read successfully.
flan.errorFile: The tome %1$s refuses to be read.
flan.readConflict: %1$s clashes with existing wards. Not woven into this world. Conflicts:
flan.giveClaimBlocks: Blessed these souls with %2$d claim blocks: %1$s.
flan.giveClaimBlocksBonus: Granted these souls %2$d bonus claim blocks: %1$s.
flan.fakePlayerNotification1: A phantom hand tried to touch your ward at %1$s in %2$s.
flan.fakePlayerNotification2: Stand within your claim and click %s to bind this phantom.
flan.claimBasicInfoNamed: Claim %7$s, keeper %1$s, reaches from [x=%2$d,z=%3$d] to [x=%4$d,z=%5$d]; Sub-wards: %6$d.
flan.screenTextJson: Right click to inscribe JSON text. See the MC wiki for deeper lore.
flan.screenEnterText: Shape the title spoken on entering.
flan.screenEnterSubText: Shape the whisper beneath the title on entering.
flan.screenLeaveText: Shape the title spoken on leaving.
flan.screenLeaveSubText: Shape the whisper beneath the title on leaving.
flan.sellDisabled: The trade of claim blocks is sealed.
flan.buyDisabled: The purchase of claim blocks is sealed.
flan.sellFail: You lack enough bound blocks to trade.
flan.buyFail: Your purse holds too little to pay the tithe.
flan.buyFailItem: The offered items are too few.
flan.sellSuccessItem: You traded %1$s claim blocks for %3$s x%2$s.
flan.sellSuccessXP: You traded %1$s claim blocks for %2$s experience.
flan.buySuccessItem: You purchased %1$s claim blocks with %2$s items.
flan.buySuccessXP: You purchased %1$s claim blocks with %2$s experience.
flan.currencyMissing: No compatible currency magic could be found.
flan.trappedRescue: The ward will free you soon. Stand still for 5 seconds.
flan.trappedFail: No rescue is needed or the ritual already began.
flan.trappedMove: You moved and the ritual broke.
flan.unlockDropsCmd: Your death spoils are bound. Use %1$s to loosen them for others.
flan.unlockDrops: Your fallen items are now loosened for %1$s ticks.
flan.claimNameUsed: The keeper already holds another claim with that name.
flan.claimNameUsedSub: One of this claim's sub-wards already bears that name.
flan.teleportNoClaim: No such claim responds to your call.
flan.teleportHome: You feel the pull of home. Do not move for 5 seconds.
flan.addIgnoreEntry: Added %1$s to this claim's ignore sigils %2$s.
flan.removeIgnoreEntry: Removed %1$s from this claim's ignore sigils %2$s.
flan.wiki: For deeper lore, consult the wiki:
flan:edit_claim.desc: Grants the bearer power to shape and unmake the claim.
flan:edit_perms.desc: Grants the bearer power to rewrite the bindings of the claim.
flan:edit_potions.desc: Grants the bearer power to infuse or drain potion effects from the claim.
flan:break.desc: Allows blocks within the ward to be broken by the bearer.
flan:place.desc: Allows the bearer to set new blocks within the ward.
flan:open_container.desc: Allows the bearer to open chests, furnaces and other vessels of storage.
flan:interact_block.desc: A general blessing for block interaction. Falls back to OPENCONTAINER when no other rite applies. Covers all blocks that OPENCONTAINER leaves untouched.
flan:interact_sign.desc: Allows the bearer to alter and dye signs.
flan:anvil.desc: Allows the bearer to work steel and name on anvils.
flan:bed.desc: Allows the bearer to rest and set spawn in beds.
flan:beacon.desc: Allows the bearer to tune the powers of beacons.
flan:door.desc: Allows the bearer to open and close doors.
flan:fence_gate.desc: Allows the bearer to open and close fence gates.
flan:trapdoor.desc: Allows the bearer to open and close trapdoors.
flan:button_lever.desc: Allows the bearer to pull levers and press buttons.
flan:pressure_plate.desc: Allows the bearer to trigger pressure plates.
flan:noteblock.desc: Allows the bearer to change the tune of noteblocks.
flan:redstone.desc: Allows the bearer to rewire redstone contraptions.
flan:jukebox.desc: Allows the bearer to place and take music discs.
flan:enderchest.desc: Allows the bearer to peer into ender chests.
flan:enchantment.desc: Allows the bearer to work with enchanting tables.
flan:itemframe_rotate.desc: Allows the bearer to turn relics within item frames.
flan:lectern_take.desc: Allows the bearer to change tomes upon lecterns.
flan:endcrystal_place.desc: Allows the bearer to place end crystals, with all that implies.
flan:target_block.desc: Allows the bearer to activate target blocks.
flan:projectiles.desc: Allows the bearer to let arrows and other missiles trigger blocks. For example arrows upon buttons or plates.
flan:trample.desc: Allows the bearer to trample fragile blocks such as farmland and turtle eggs.
flan:frost_walker.desc: Allows frost walker to lay its icy path.
flan:portal.desc: Allows the bearer to step through nether portals.
flan:raid.desc: Allows raids to be called and fought within the ward. Does not prevent raids gathering just beyond the border.
flan:boat.desc: Allows the bearer to use boats upon these waters.
flan:minecart.desc: Allows the bearer to ride minecarts upon these rails.
flan:bucket.desc: Allows the bearer to draw liquids with buckets.
flan:ender_pearl.desc: Allows the bearer to slip through space with ender pearls.
flan:chorus_fruit.desc: Allows the bearer to blink through reality by eating chorus fruit.
flan:animal_interact.desc: Allows the bearer to perform gentle rites on beasts such as shearing sheep.
flan:hurt_animal.desc: Allows the bearer to harm beasts within the ward.
flan:xp.desc: Allows the bearer to draw in experience orbs.
flan:trading.desc: Allows the bearer to trade with villagers.
flan:armorstand.desc: Allows the bearer to pose and adjust armor stands.
flan:break_non_living.desc: Allows the bearer to break crafted forms like minecarts or armor stands.
flan:drop.desc: Allows the bearer to let items fall from hand.
flan:pickup.desc: Allows the bearer to gather loose items from the ground.
flan:flight.desc: Allows non creative flight within the ward.
flan:can_stay.desc: Allows the named soul to dwell within your claim.
flan:teleport.desc: Allows the bearer to be drawn to your claim's home.
flan:no_hunger.desc: Stills the gnawing of hunger within the ward.
flan:claim_message.desc: Allows the bearer to shape the words spoken when entering and leaving.
flan:hurt_player.desc: Allows the bearer to harm other players within the ward.
flan:explosions.desc: Allows or forbids explosions within the ward.
flan:wither.desc: Controls whether withers may tear blocks apart within the ward.
flan:enderman.desc: Allows endermen to pick up and place blocks here.
flan:snow_golem.desc: Allows snow golems to trail snow upon the ground.
flan:fire_spread.desc: Controls whether fire may creep from block to block.
flan:water_border.desc: Controls whether water may cross the ward's borders.
flan:piston_border.desc: Controls whether pistons may push or pull across the ward's borders.
flan:mob_spawn.desc: Prevents hostile creatures from rising within the ward.
flan:animal_spawn.desc: Prevents other peaceful spawns from appearing within the ward.
flan:lightning.desc: Controls whether lightning may scar blocks or animals here. Mobs remain unaffected by this choice.
flan:lock_items.desc: Determines whether your items cling to you in death.
flan:fake_player.desc: Allows phantoms and modded fake players to act here. Some mods use the owner's uuid and ignore this binding.
flan:player_mob_spawn.desc: Allows bound players to call forth mobs through special interactions. Such as wardens or endermites from pearls.
flan:sculk.desc: Guides sculk sensors. Shriekers are handled by PLAYERMOBSPAWN.
flan:archeology.desc: Allows players to brush away dust and secrets in this claim.
command.flan.help: help <page> | (cmd <command>) Reveals all known subcommands or deeper lore about one.
command.flan.menu: menu When you stand within a claim you may shape, this opens its grimoire.
command.flan.claimInfo: claimInfo Whispers the lore of the claim beneath your feet.
command.flan.deleteAll: deleteAll Unmakes all your claims. You must speak it twice to prove your intent.
command.flan.deleteAllSubClaims: deleteAllSubClaims Unmakes all subclaims tied to the current claim.
command.flan.list: list <player> Lists all claims you hold. With op power, you may peer at others as well.
command.flan.switchMode: switchMode Shifts your focus between normal and subclaim work.
command.flan.group: group (add | remove <name>) | (players add | remove <player> [overwrite]) - Adds or removes a named circle. Also shaped through the claim grimoire. - Adds or removes a soul from a circle. With overwrite, breaks its old bonds. Also shaped through the grimoire.
command.flan.transferClaim: transferClaim <player> Hands the claim to another soul. Only the true keeper may do this.
command.flan.addClaim: addClaim (<x y z> <x y z>) | all | (rect x z) Forms a claim at the given corners, just as the claim tool would. <all> uses all remaining blocks to weave a square around you. <rect> weaves a rectangle centered on your position.
command.flan.permission: permission {global | (group <name>) | (personal <name>)} <permission> true | false | default  Sets global, circle or personal bindings. Also shaped through the grimoire, where right click edits circle bindings.
command.flan.personalGroups: personalGroups Opens the window to edit your private circles.
command.flan.sellBlocks: sellBlocks <amount> Trades <amount> claim blocks for currency. Requires a supported currency mod.
command.flan.buyBlocks: buyBlocks <amount> Buys <amount> claim blocks. Requires a supported currency mod.
command.flan.trapped: trapped If you are trapped in another's ward, this tries to pull you free after 5 seconds.
command.flan.unlockDrops: unlockDrops <players> Loosens deathbound items so others may claim them, or for all given players with op might.
command.flan.setHome: setHome Standing in a claim with enough binding, sets that claim's home to your location.
command.flan.teleport: teleport self | admin | (other <player>) (<claim name> | <claim uuid>) Pulls you to the home of a claim. Use admin to reach overseer claims.
command.flan.name: name self <name> Sets the current claim's spoken name.
command.flan.claimMessage: claimMessage (enter | leave) (title | subtitle) (string | text) <value> Shapes the claim's enter or leave words. Use "$empty" to erase them.
command.flan.ignoreList: ignoreList (add | remove) <type> <value> Adds or removes entries from the claim's ignore sigils.
command.flan.adminMode: adminMode Wraps you in overseer veil, ignoring all claims.
command.flan.readGriefPrevention: readGriefPreventionData Draws claim lore from old GriefPrevention records.
command.flan.setAdminClaim: setAdminClaim Marks a claim as an overseer ward.
command.flan.listAdminClaims: listAdminClaim Lists all overseer claims in this realm.
command.flan.adminDelete: adminDelete [all <player>] Forcefully unmakes the current claim or all claims of a given soul.
command.flan.giveClaimBlocks: giveClaimBlocks <amount> Gifts a soul with additional claim blocks.
